fields.name: wheelchair accessible trails
fields.description: Trails designed with flat surfaces, minimal inclines, and no obstacles to accommodate wheelchair users.

fields.name: accessible viewpoints
fields.description: Viewpoints with ramps or flat access, ensuring easy visibility for those with mobility issues.

fields.name: accessible picnic areas
fields.description: Picnic areas with wide, flat surfaces, accessible tables, and easy wheelchair access.

fields.name: accessible shelters
fields.description: Shelters that are easy to access for individuals with mobility challenges, featuring ramps, flat entrances, and accessible pathways.

fields.name: accessible parking
fields.description: Parking spots located close to facilities, with extra space for wheelchair access, and clear markings.

fields.name: wheelchair accessible restrooms
fields.description: Restrooms with wide stalls, handrails, accessible sinks, for wheelchair

fields.name: family restrooms
fields.description: Gender-neutral restrooms with enough space for families, caregivers, and individuals needing assistance.

fields.name: clear signage
fields.description: Large, easy-to-read signs accessible points of interest with good color contrast and symbols.

fields.name: accessible maps
fields.description: Park maps that highlight accessible routes, facilities, and emergency stations, including tactile and braille options.

fields.name: accessible campsites
fields.description: Campsites with hard surfaces, accessible tables, designated accessible sites, and pathways designed for easy access.

fields.name: accessible cabins
fields.description: Cabins with ramps, wide doorways, accessible interiors

fields.name: accessible public transportation
fields.description: Public transportation options that offer wheelchair access and accomodation

fields.name: accessible visitor centers
fields.description: Visitor centers with accessible entrances, ramps, elevators.

fields.name: automatic doors
fields.description: Doors that automatically open

fields.name: braille signage
fields.description: Signage with braille text, allowing visually impaired visitors to navigate the park more easily.

fields.name: tactile maps
fields.description: Maps with raised surfaces to assist visually impaired visitors in understanding the park layout.

fields.name: accessible beach access
fields.description: Paths and ramps that allow wheelchair users to access the beach easily

fields.name: floating beach wheelchairs
fields.description: Special wheelchairs designed to provide water access for individuals with mobility issues.

fields.name: boardwalks
fields.description: Flat, even wooden walkways that make walking or wheeling through the park easier.

fields.name: wide paths
fields.description: Paths with extra width to accommodate wheelchairs, strollers, and individuals needing more space.

fields.name: sensory-friendly areas
fields.description: Quiet or low-sensory areas designed to provide a calming environment for visitors with sensory sensitivities.

fields.name: inclusive play areas
fields.description: Playgrounds with accessible equipment and inclusive designs for children with different mobility levels.

fields.name: accessible water facilities
fields.description: Water fountains and standpipes with accessible heights, operable handles.

fields.name: accessible garbage and recycling receptacles
fields.description: Garbage receptacles designed for easy access by individuals with limited dexterity, including clear ground space and operable mechanisms.

fields.name: accessible seating
fields.description: Benches and seating areas with backrests, armrests, and firm, level ground (seating).

fields.name: accessible boat launches
fields.description: Boat launch areas equipped with handrails, level surfaces, and accessible pathways for easy water access.

fields.name: accessible changing facilities
fields.description: Changing rooms with level entry, accessible sinks, seating, and appropriate grab bars

fields.name: accessible cooking facilities
fields.description: Food prep and cooking areas with accessible counters, sinks, and equipment

fields.name: accessible pathways with minimal slopes
fields.description: Paths designed with gentle inclines, firm surfaces, and minimal obstacles or slopes

fields.name: accessible ramps and thresholds
fields.description: Ramps with appropriate gradients and thresholds that are level or have minimal height.

fields.name: accessible stairways
fields.description: Stairways with consistent rise and run, handrails, and tactile or color contrast indicators for safety.

fields.name: accessible information kiosks
fields.description: Information kiosks that are easily accessible, including accessible heights and interactive features.

fields.name: accessible by public transit
fields.description: Visitors can use public transit to reach the park.

fields.name: accessible amphitheaters
fields.description: Amphitheaters with level seating areas, accessible entrances, and spaces for individuals with mobility aids.

fields.name: accessible pit toilets
fields.description: Pit toilets with accessible features such as wider doorways, grab bars, appropriate toilet heights, and space for maneuvering.

fields.name: accessible shower facilities
fields.description: Showers equipped with seating, grab bars, adjustable showerheads, and controls operable with minimal force.

fields.name: accessible information boards
fields.description: Information boards with high-contrast text and Braille to assist visually impaired visitors.

fields.name: accessible picnic shelters
fields.description: Picnic shelters connected to accessible pathways, with level entrances, and sufficient space for mobility.
